column1: National Policy on Foreigners: people from the Balkans and Jews from Eastern Europe were not allowed to work in Switzerland
The Nazis seize power in Germany
Switzerland makes a contract with Italy, regulating the issue of guest workers
Switzerland makes a contract with Spain, regulating the issue of guest workers
The State of Israel is founded
Hitler is declared Führer of Germany
Germany is defeated at the Battle of Stalingrad
German defeat in the Battle of Kursk
KZ Bergen-Belsen becomes a concentration camp
Germany bans Jews and political opponents from government positions
The Nuremberg Laws strip Jews of German citizenship and civil rights
Passports of German Jews are stamped with a "J"
